column4: I want to use nautilus to browse on a remote server via scp, but it uses sftp and if enter scp as protocol it says it can not handle scp, but i read, that it can
so what i have to do to use scp?
i don't see there nothing it tested already. if understand it correct, it says, i have to use scp://  but it still doesen't work. Nautilus cannot handle scp: locations.
